name: Student Taught Courses (StuCo): Origami Design Fundamentals
base_name: Student Taught Courses (StuCo): Origami Design Fundamentals
long_desc: Origami is the ancient Japanese art of paper folding. In this StuCo, we will be exploring different folding techniques and algorithms for designing your own origami models. Students will learn the basics of foldability, as well as how to create novel tessellations, animals, curved folds, and thick origami. This course is heavily project based, and students will be expected to work on their origami models outside of class.
